Ninfa manufactures bed linen sets that generate income for her food, electricity and water costs.  She needs a loan to buy raw materials; she’ll buy fabric, lace and thread to improve her income and her quality of life.  Ninfa’s dream is to have a sewing workshop.  This is her third time with IMPRO and third with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Narda

texts.es:
La señora Narda se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo, vive en casa propia en un acabado fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda esta ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
Narda es empleada de una farmacia y también vende cosméticos por catalogo, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua, teléfono; el crédito lo requiere para aumentar su capital de trabajo y comprar más cosmeticos y así mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida e ella y sus dos hijos.
El sueño de Narda es tener una tienda donde pueda vender sus productos y también que sus hijos terminen sus estudios universitarios.
Es la primera vez con IMPRO y la primera vez con Kiva.
texts.en: Narda works selling cosmetics via catalogue.  She lives in her own house that has fine finishing touches and a wood floor; the house is located in the city of La Paz’s Alto San Pedro zone.  Narda is a pharmacy employee and also sells cosmetics via catalogue generating income to cover her food, electricity, water and telephone costs.  She needs the loan to increase working capital to buy more cosmetics to improve her income and her and her two children’s quality of life.  Narda’s dream is to have a store to sell her products in and also that her children complete their university studies.  This is her first time with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to stay in business.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther de 59 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, carismática con muchas ganas de superación. Esta separada de su conviviente hace muchos años atrás. Tiene 01 hija quien acaba de culminar sus estudios universitarios. Juntos habitan cómodamente en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza  Esther es la crianza de pollos de granja, para esto cuenta con un galpón de capacidad para 500 pollos, que está ubicado en su propio terreno, para luego venderlo a los comerciantes de los mercados más cercanos donde tiene una clientela que se gano por sus entregas puntuales y buen servicio.
Ésta actividad lo inicio gracias a la idea de su ex pareja que también le apoyo con un pequeño aporte de capital. 
Lo considera rentable ya que gracias a ello tienen un buen ingreso económico, y así puede apoyar a su hija con los gastos en sus estudios y puede brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. 
 Espera seguir creciendo y  ampliar su galpón y así tener una mayor producción. Antes de empezar con éste negocio, no tenía problemas económicos, sino comenta decidió empezar para poder tener una ocupación e ir creciendo como empresaria. Ahora viendo los buenos resultados, desea continuar con su negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP. Se siente contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Por eso se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, como lo venía haciendo en los créditos anteriores. Además se siente a gusto con su banco comunal pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de materiales como listones, hojas de irapay y otros, para la construcción de otro galpón de capacidad para 1000 pollos, así aumentar su capacidad de producción viendo crecer su negocio, buscando conseguir precios bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Esther is 59 years old and is an enterprising, charismatic woman with an eagerness to overcome. She separated from her partner many years ago. She has one daughter who has just completed her university studies. Together they live comfortably in her own home.

Esther raises farm chickens. She has a barn with a 500 chicken capacity located on her own land. She sells to merchants in nearby markets and has won her clientele by timely delivery and good service.

She started this activity thanks to an idea of her former partner, in order to support him with a small contribution of capital. She considers it to be profitable since she has a good income, and she can support her daughter with the expenses of her studies and give them both a better quality of life.

She hopes to continue growing and expanding her shed and thus have higher production. Before she started this business she didn't have economic problems, but decided to start in order to have an occupation and to grow as an entrepreneur. Now seeing good results, she wants to continue with the business. This will be her first loan with MFP. She feels happy to know that the financial support will advance her business. That is why she is committed to be punctual with the payments as she has been with past loans. Also, she feels comfortable with this loan because of the group unity and solidarity.

With the 800 nuevos soles ($325) requested, she will invest them in buying materials like slats, irapy leaves and others for the construction of another shed with a capacity for 1000 chickens, thus increasing her production capacity and growing her business. She is looking for great prices by purchasing at such a high volume.

loans.use: to buy materials such as slats, irapay leaves, and others for the construction of another shed for 1000 chickens.

loans.name: Marubeni

texts.es:
Marubeni, de 38 años de edad, es una  mujer trabajadora y decidida, además de ser alegre y cordial. Vive junto a su conviviente Digno y a lado de sus 02  hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad. Viven en cómodamente en su casa propia. El negocio que tiene Marubeni es la venta de comidas como juanes, pollos asados, anticuchos y otros. Todos las tardes instala su mesa en el frontis de su casa propia y oferta todas sus viandas preparadas, además de refrescos, atendiendo muy amablemente a sus clientes quienes son en su mayoría sus propios vecinos, y la recomiendan a otros personas que con el tiempo se vuelven sus clientes habituales.
Se inició hace más de 08 años con un préstamo particular, comprando y vendiendo en pocas cantidades, para luego ir aumentando de acuerdo a la demanda de sus comidas, y hasta el momento lo realiza ella sola.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja, y que casi siempre acaba todo lo que prepara para vender.
Además comenta le gusta su negocio pues conoce de cocina y se decidió a empezar por la necesidad de contar con un ingreso propio y tener un oficio pues la pensión para sus hijos no les alcanzaba y tenía apuros económicos.
Ahora viendo los buenos resultados desea ampliarse y abrir una bodega de venta de abarrotes en su vivienda. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que seguirá teniendo acceso a una línea de crédito para continuar con sus planes. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal, pues conoce a sus integrantes, los considera sus amigos y son responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevo soles, lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes en general buscando precios cómodos por sus compras, así empezar con éste nuevo negocio y aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Marubeni, 38, is a hardworking, determined, happy, and cordial woman. She lives comfortably in her own home with her live-in partner Digno and their two children, ages 12 and 10. Marubeni sells prepared traditional foods such as juanes, grilled chicken, and meat skewers. Every afternoon she sets up a table in the patio of her house to offer prepared meats and sodas and friendly service to her customers, who are mainly neighbors who recommend her to others who then become regular customers. 

Eight years ago, she received a personal loan and started selling and buying in small lots. She increased her purchases as customer demand increased, and, up to that time, she financed the business on her own. The business was profitable, and she sold almost everything she made. She likes her work because she knows how to cook. She started her business because she needed her own income and job, as her pension did not cover her children's expenses, and she had financial difficulties.

Having been successful, she wants to expand and open a small grocery store in her house, and this will be her sixth loan cycle with MFP. She is pleased that she continues to have access to the credit necessary for her plans. She likes her communal bank because she considers its members as her friends and they are responsible. With the loan of 800 nuevo soles, she will buy a variety of groceries at affordable prices so that she can start her new business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy staples to stock her new grocery store.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гульнара 27 лет, замужем, имеет 1 замечательного сына. Гульнара в качестве основного источника дохода занимается животноводством. Начав этот бизнес с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS) 7 лет назад, благодаря упорному труду Гульнара смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме 10,000 сом (KGS).На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве имеется 4 коровы, 4 лошади и 10 голов овец. Благодаря прибыли от хозяйства, Гульнара оплачивает затраты на основные нужды семьи. Гульнара продает с дома молоко и молочную продукцию. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гульнара обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) для покупки дополнительных голов скота. Что позволит увеличить сбор молока и соответственно доходы семьи. Доходы от кредита Гульнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства и в будущем хочет осуществить свою давлению мечту, приобрести автомобиль.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 27 years old, married and has a wonderful son. Gulnara works with livestock breeding, which is their main source of income. After having started this business 7 years ago with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS), Gulnara was able to develop her business thanks to persistent work. The monthly income is in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Today the farm counts 4 cows, 4 horses and 10 sheep. Thanks to the income from the business, Gulnara can pay for the basic needs of the family. Gulnara sells milk and dairy products from her home. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Gulnara turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of additional heads of livestock. This will increase the amount of milk, and accordingly, the family's income. Gulnara plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business and in the future would like to realize her dream of purchasing a car.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock

loans.name: Uulbek

texts.ru: Уулбек 53 год, вдова, имеет 2 детей.Оба сына работают в Бишкеке.муж Уулбек скоропостижно скончался. Они начинали свой бизнес с мужем, после его смерти она осталась с детьми одна со всеми житейскими проблемами. Несмотря на все проблемы она остается все такой же жизнерадостной и веселой. Она твердо уверена в светлое будущее своей семьи. Уулбек в качестве основного источника дохода для семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря настойчивости и упорному труду, Уулбек сумела развить свой бизнес с 20,000 KGS  сегодня ежемесячный доход бизнеса составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Уулбек обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и подготовку на весенний период. Доходы от кредита Уулбек планирует вложить в расширение обрабатываемого поля  и увеличения количества скотины. Она мечтает чтобы дети имели хорошую работу в будущем и хорошую семью.
texts.en:
Uulbek is 53 years old and widowed with two children.  Her son works in Bishkek.  Uulbek's husband died suddenly.  They had started their business together, but after his death Uulbek was left alone with the children and all the household problems.  Despite all the troubles, Uulbek is still lively and cheerful.  She firmly believes in a bright future for her family.  Uulbek is involved in animal husbandry and agriculture, which are the main sources of income for her family.  

Thanks to her perseverance and hard work, Uulbek was able to develop her business with 20,000 som (KGS) and now her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS).  To further increase her business, Uulbek has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy one cow and to get ready for the spring.  She plans to use the income from the loan to expand her tilled field and to increase her head of livestock.  Uulbek dreams that one day in the future her children will have good work and a good family.

loans.use: To purchase one cow and to prepare field for seeding.

loans.name: Posiano

texts.en: Posiano is a 34-year-old married man with four children living in Kagadi, Uganda. Seven years go he decided to venture into local brew trade in order to support his growing family. With the income earned he has been able to pay school fees for his children. Inadequate capital to meet the high demand poses a challenge to his business, while his desire is to expand his business to new areas. Posiano intends to use the loan to buy local brew to sell ahead of the Christmas season when demand is high.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Marianita

texts.en: Marianita is 62 years old, married, and has eight children. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Marianita requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Marianita has been fattening pigs for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Marianita would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ambari

texts.en:
Ambari lives in the Mariakani area of Kenya. He is a married father of two children. He owns a green grocery stall, which he has been operating for eight years. In this business, Ambari sells greens, fruits, vegetables, cereals, etc. 

Ambari learned about Milango through a friend and joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. The challenges he faces are bad debts and the high cost of transportation. 

Ambari is applying for a loan of 31,450 KES to buy fruits, vegetables and cereals. The extra income from the loan will be added to his savings to expand his business. His plans for the future are to start other businesses and also open stalls in different areas.

loans.use: To buy fruits, vegetables and cereals.

loans.name: Mwanazia

texts.en:
Mwanazia is a hardworking woman who is dedicated to her work. She is a teacher by profession but she also runs a small business selling fish from her home. Her aim is to be a well-known businesswoman in the vicinity and its environs. 

Mwanazia is asking for a new loan to invest in the purchase of stock of fish to sell. Thanks to her efforts and the previous loan, she has been able to provide her son with basic necessities and a good education. She promises to repay this loan as scheduled.

loans.use: to purchase stock of fish to sell.

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.es:
La señora Prudencia se dedica al lavado de arena y además elabora mantas de hilo para señoras de pollera, vive en alquiler con un acabado de adobe y piso de cemento, su vivienda está ubicada en la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.

Prudencia lava arena y elabora polleras, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de capital, pues comprará hilo y tela de diferentes colores para aumentar su producción y así mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Prudencia es tener un taller de tejido y tener su casa propia.
Es la quinta vez con IMPRO y la quinta con Kiva.
texts.en: Prudencia works washing sand and also manufacturing fabric from thread to be used by women in their ‘polleras’ [traditional skirts].  She lives in a rented adobe house with a cement floor located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone.  Prudencia washes sand and manufactures ‘polleras’ generating income that way to cover her food, electricity and water costs.  She needs the loan to increase capital for she’ll buy thread and fabric in various colors to increase production and thus improve her income and her quality of life.  Prudencia’s dream is to have a weaving workshop and to own a house.  This is her fifth time with IMPRO and fifth with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Lili

texts.es:
Lili, de 44 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y cordial, con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Esta casada con José quien es comerciante. Vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 04 hijos de 21, 18, 13 y 7 años. La a actividad que realiza Lili es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, para eso cuenta con una bodega que instaló en local en el interior de su vivienda, donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes que en su mayoría son su vecinos y ha sabido ganarse sus preferencias por el buen trato que les brinda.
Se inició hace más de 05 años con un préstamo de MFP y hasta el momento lo realiza sola, pero en ocasiones le ayudan sus hijos en la atención  a los clientes.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable pues sus productos son de primera necesidad y que tiene salida a diario, dando una rotación constante a su capital. Antes de empezar con su actividad, no tenía problemas, pero si los deseos de generase sus propios ingresos y apoyara a su padres con los gastos del hogar. 
Por tanto, viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo, tiene deseos de continuar con su negocio e incursionar en otro negocio de venta de ropas, pues ha visto que es bastante rentable. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Además se siente cómoda con su banco comunal por el apoyo y la solidaridad que siente en sus integrantes.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de abarrotes en general para surtir su negocio y así tener un stock variado disponible para la  venta, buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen, de esa manera tendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Lili, 44, is hardworking, dedicated, kind, cordial, and wants to succeed. Her husband José is a merchant, and they live with their four children, ages 21, 18, 13, and 7. Lili sells staple items from a space in her house. She waits on her customers, who are mainly neighbors who prefer her friendly service. She started more than five years ago with a loan from MFP. Until now, she has mostly run the business herself, though sometimes her children help wait on customers. 

The business is profitable as the items are staples that are sold every day and generate a steady cash flow. She had no problems before undertaking this business; she wanted to have her own income and help her parents meet household expenses. Since it is successful, Lili wants to keep her business going while starting another business selling clothing, which she sees is quite profitable. 

This will be her sixth loan cycle with MFP, and she is pleased that she can count on financing to grow her business. She is happy to have the support and unity of her communal bank members. With the loan of 800 nuevos soles, she will purchase general groceries to stock her business and have a variety to sell. She will look for low prices as she purchases wholesale inventory so that she will earn more profit.

loans.use: to buy wholesale staple items.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María, de 43 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser amable y cordial en su trato a los demás. Vive junto a su conviviente Pedro quien es comerciante y su hijo de 3 años de edad. Viven cómodamente en su casa propia la cual adquirieron con el mucho esfuerzo y trabajo. La actividad que realiza María es la venta de comidas como juanes, tallarines y otros por las mañanas. Para eso cuenta con un puesto en el mercado cerca a su casa donde atiende de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes ganándose su preferencia. 
Se inició hace más de 10 años con un capital propio y preparando en pequeñas cantidades, viendo la acogida que tenía su negocio, decidió continuar, y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su mamá en la preparación y atención de los clientes, compartiendo sus ganancias con ella.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable porque casi siempre acaba todo lo que prepara para vender, dejándole buenas ganancias.
Decidió empezar con éste negocio debido a la necesidad de contar con un oficio y un ingreso económico para cubrir sus gastos y apoyar a su pareja.
Viendo los buenos resultados que está tendiendo con su negocio tiene planes de continuar y hacerlo crecer. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP, está contenta de saber que tendrá accesos un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. 
Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal  pues conoce a la mayoría de sus  integrantes y los considera ser personas amables y responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios para cocina como ollas, platos, vasos y otros, para renovar los que tiene, así brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
43-year-old María is a hard-working, diligent woman who is kind and friendly in her treatment of others.  She lives alongside her partner Pedro, who is a trader, and their 3-year-old son.  The family live comfortably in their own home which they worked hard to obtain.  María's business is selling food such as 'juanes' (a traditional Peruvian dish) and noodles in the mornings.  She has a stall in the market near her home where she serves her customers in a kind and friendly manner, thereby gaining their loyalty.

María started out more than 10 years ago with her own capital, preparing her food in small quantities.  Seeing how popular her business was becoming, she decided to keep going with it.  She has her mom's help in preparing the food and serving the customers, and she shares the profits with her.  She considers her business to be fairly profitable because she always sells everything she prepares.  This makes her good profits.

María decided to start this business as she needed a job and an income so that she could cover her expenses and support her partner.  Given the good results she is obtaining with her business, she has plans to keep going and to grow the business further.  This will be her second loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she has access to financial support so that she can carry out her plans.  In addition, she says that she feels very happy with her community bank as she knows most of the other members and she considers them to be kind and responsible people.

María will invest the sum of 1,000 soles that she has requested in buying cooking utensils such as pots, dishes, cups, etc. so that she can replace the ones she currently has.  This will enable her to provide her customers with a better service.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils such as pans, dishes and cups

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en:
Narantsetseg is a 41-year-old widow who lives with her mother and son in a rental apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. She started her underwear sales business in 2009, and it was successful due to her determination and hard work. Now she sells not only underwear, but also other clothes especially meant for children. In the future, she wants to build a shop where foods and other things will be sold.

Her dream is to live with her son in a comfortable apartment, but she couldn’t afford it. So she decided to build a house where she and her son can live happily. 

To build a house, she needs a 6,000,000 MNT loan. High quality house she will build shall reduce the consumption of coal and it has positive effect on environmental protection. As a result mother and son can live comfortably.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Zairakan

texts.ru: Зайракан 56 лет, замужем и мать восьмерых детей. Супруг Зайракан помогает ей по хозяйству. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, Зайракан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве еще 1975 году, использовав для этого стартовую сумму 16,000 сом (KGS). Успешно работая в сфере животноводства и полеводства добилась очень хороших результатов, Зайракан также выращивает кормовые культуры, что позволяет ей обеспечивать кормами свой скот и иметь дополнительный доход от продажи кормов.Помимо кормовых на своём участке Зайракан выращивает пшеница. Ежемесячно семья имеет до 5,000 KGS. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Зайракан обратилась в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров . На прибыль от кредита Зайракан планирует увеличить своё хозяйство. Зайракан поделилась, что в будущем она планирует обучить младшего сына и улучшить условия содержания скота.
texts.en: Zairakan is 56 years old and is married with eight children.  Her husband helps her around the house.  In search of a source of income for her family, Zairakan started her business raising animals in 1975 with a starting sum of 16,000 som (KGS).  Having successfully worked in areas like livestock and agriculture, Zairakan also grows fodder, which she uses to feed her animals.  She sells the extra fodder to supplement her family's income.  In addition to the fodder, Zairakan also grows wheat on her plot of land.  Her monthly income is 5,000 KGS.  To further increase her business, Zairakan has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners to ask for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy cows.  With the income from this loan, she plans on improving her family's standard of living.  Zairakan has told us that in the future she plans on paying for her younger son's education and improving the living conditions of her animals.

loans.use: To purchase cows

loans.name: Gulmiyra

texts.ru: Гульмийре 53 года, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи, 6 лет назад Гульмийра начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве со стартовой суммой 50,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гульмийры, на сегодня ее хозяйство со скотом приносит около 5,000 KGS  в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Доходы от бизнес – деятельности позволяют Гульмийре оплачивать повседневные нужды семьи. Для дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, Гульмийра обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошадей. Для последующей реализации. Доходы Гульмийра планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства и  в ближайшем будущем планирует выдать замуж дочь.
texts.en: Gulmiyra is 53 years old and is married with four children.  In search of a source of income for her family, Gulmiyra started her business in livestock and agriculture six years ago with the stating sum of 50,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, her farm and livestock now bring in about 5,000 KGS per month from the sale of milk and dairy products.  The income from her business allows Gulmiyra to provide for the needs of her family.  For the future development of her business, Gulmiyra has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy horses for resale.  Gulmiyra plans to use this income to improve her living conditions and to marry off her daughter in the near future.

loans.use: To purchase horses

loans.name: Mtune

texts.en:
Mtune lives in the Mariakani area of Kenya. He is a married father of two children. He owns a green grocery stall, which he has been operating for four years. In this business, Mtune sells greens, fruits, vegetables, cereals, etc. 

Mtune learned about Milango through a friend and joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. The challenge he faces is a seasonal business climate. 

Mtune is applying for a loan of 15,850 KES to buy fruits, vegetables and cereals. This will help him establish a new stall. The extra income from the loan will help him educate his children. His plans for the future are to start other businesses and also open stalls in different areas.

loans.use: To buy fruits, vegetables and cereals.

loans.name: Damaritha

texts.en: Damaritha is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be a focused woman. She operates a retail stall where she sells clothes that are called "mitumba" in the local language. Her business is located at a viable business environment, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the 5,800 KES loan to buy a solar lamp that will be used by her five family members to provide light at night. Her business goal is to improve her business within five years.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp

loans.name: Oyunbaatar

texts.en:
Oyunbaatar is 41 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on his father’s plot of land. Recently he began an internet cafe business.  Prior to that, he had been running a taxi service for local residents. Another income source is his wife's textile shop, which came into existence with the help of a loan. 

Numerous children come to internet café each day and he saw it as another business opportunity. In order to open a cafeteria, he is requesting a loan for 2,000,000 MNT, which he will use to buy kitchen appliances and repair the heating system. By doing so, the family can add to its income source. His  daughter studies food technology in college and after graduating she wants to run this cafeteria business. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who believes in his family’s bright future.

loans.use: to open a cafeteria.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
La señora Teodora se dedica a la  venta de diversos productos como ser tunta, orégano, ají y otros, vive en casa propia en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada el la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Teodora es comerciante, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para el aumento de capital, comprará tunta, ají, orégano y otros  para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Teodora es ampliar su negocio.
Es la décima vez con IMPRO y la séptima con Kiva.
texts.en: Teodora works selling various products like dehydrated potatoes, oregano, chili and others.  She lives in her own house made of bricks and with a cement floor; it’s located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone.  Teodora’s a merchant.  She generates income to cover her food, electricity and water costs.  She needs the loan to increase capital.  She will buy dehydrated potato, chili, oregano and others to improve her income and quality of life.  Teodora’s dream is to expand her business.  This is her 10th time with IMPRO and 7th with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy chili, oregano, dehydrated potatoes and other products to sell at retail.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario se dedica a la elaboración de diversas masitas, vive en casa propia en un acabado fino  y piso de cemento, su vivienda está ubicada en la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Rosario elabora masitas como ser empanadas, queques y otros, para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua; el crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos como ser harina, azúcar, mantequilla, y así continuar con su negocio y mejorar su ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Rosario es tener su propia pastelería.
Es la segunda vez con IMPRO y la segunda con Kiva.
texts.en: Rosario works making various baked goods.  She lives in her own house that has fine finishing touches and a cement floor; it’s located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone.  Rosario makes baked goods like turnovers, cakes and others to cover her food, electricity and water costs.  She needs the loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar and butter to continue with her business and improve her income and her quality of life.  Rosario’s dream is to own her own pastry shop.  This is the second time with IMPRO and second with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy baking supplies.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
Marco  es carpintero elabora muebles y puertas de madera, vive en casa de sus padres en un acabado fino y piso de machimbre, su vivienda está ubicada en la zona de Irpavi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Marco  es carpintero, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua;  el crédito lo  requiere para la compra de materia prima (madera) y así aumentar su producción y  mejorar su ingresos y su calidad de vida.
El sueño de  Marco  es ampliar su taller de carpintería y terminar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Marco is a carpenter; he manufactures wood furniture and doors.  He lives in his parents’ house; it has fine finishing touches and a wood floor.  His house is located in the city of La Paz’s Irpavi zone.  Marco is a carpenter and earns income to cover his food, electricity and water costs.  He needs the loan to buy raw materials (wood) to increase production and improve income and quality of life.  Marco’s dream is to expand his carpentry shop and to finish his university studies.

loans.use: to buy wood to manufacrure furniture and doors.

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es: Damaris  tiene  44 años de edad, está casada y vive con el esposo y un hijo actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar dos novillos para engordarlos para su posterior venta. Ella piensa darle la alimentación adecuada para un crecimiento rápido. Ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Damaris, 44, is married living with her husband and one child at present.  She intends to use the loan to buy two calves to fatten up for subsequent sale.  She plans to give them adequate food for fast growth.  She does not have the necessary capital for said purchase because she’s of limited resources and has no way of getting the money needed for this which is why she’s requesting a loan.  This is her first loan from Fudecosur.  She’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix tiene la edad 44 de  años, está casado y vive con la esposa y tres hijos. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de tres vacas de leche para iniciar con el proyectó de ganado de leche. El desea iniciar con este nuevo proyecto junto con sus hijos con el afán de poder salir adelante. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de su familia y crecer con el proyecto de ganado de leche. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Félix is 44 years old, married, and lives together with his wife and three children.  He plans to use his loan to buy three dairy cows so that he can start a dairy farm business.  He would like to start this new project together with his children so that they can all make progress in life.  Félix would like to make as much profit as he can so that he can ensure his family's well-being and further develop his dairy farming business.  This is Félix's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He has not received any previous loans from state banks.  FUDECOSUR have provided him with a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows

loans.name: La Florida Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “La Florida” que conforman 07 mujeres emprendedoras que pasan al ciclo 05. Augusta tiene 47 años, casada con 02 hijos. Augusta se dedica hace 3 años a la venta de ropa nueva y cuenta con clientes fidelizados, en las noches trabaja en el hospital de enfermera. Augusta ha solicitado el préstamo para comprar pantalón jean, polos, short y bibiri. Su sueño es de tener un local más grande donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes. Augusta esta agradecida con los inversionistas Kiva por seguir mejorando su negocio. Augusta se encuentra ubicada en la parte de atrás, es la primera del lado derecho viste polo plomo.
texts.en: This group is called 'La Florida'.  It has seven female members who are all entrepreneurs.  They are currently in their fifth loan cycle.  Augusta is 47 years old, married, and has two children.  For three years now she has been selling new clothing and has some loyal customers.  At night, she works in the hospital as a nurse.  Augusta has requested this loan to buy pants, jeans, tops, shorts and muscle tops.  Augusta is grateful to Kiva lenders for giving her the opportunity to continue improving her business.  In the photo Augusta is on the far-right, in the back row.  She is wearing a dark gray top.

loans.use: to buy pants, jeans, tops, shorts and muscle tops

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de esta mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar la vida de delincuencia que la rodea, siente que es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, ella posee una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas entre otros desde hace ya algún tiempo, tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto,  por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero y se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar  granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Her motivation to succeed is one of the most important dreams this woman has.  She lives with her family in a home of her own and wants to have a new beginning and leave behind the crime that surrounds her.  She feels that this is one of the best decisions she has made and she is proud of that.  She has a small store where she sells primary needs products such as basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, and other things.  She has done this for some time and has many customers who prefer her because of her products’ quality, for the good prices, and the excellent service she provides.

She is an active, entrepreneurial woman dedicated to her work and with many goals that she wants to meet.  She is working hard to reach a more prosperous future and feels satisfied with the business.  Demand has increased in the recent weeks and she wants to make a new investment, so she is asking for a loan to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, etc.  She has many payment references and is very responsible.  She is certain that she will be able to get out of debt and keep her household finances secure.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Creater Group

texts.en: This group is called Creater. It consists of four women (mainly married) and a man. They live in Aden, Yemen. The members of this group are very trustworthy, responsible and hard working. They have known each other for a long time and know each other well. The whole group took out a loan of 370,000 YER. Raba is the group leader. She is a  50-year-old married woman and has children who live in Aden. She has been selling incense and perfumes for a long time. She chose this business because she loves it. She initially started out by selling potatoes and bread, and developed her business by working hard. She has requested a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB to purchase more incense and perfumes to resell in order to grow her business and attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase incense and perfumes for resale.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa con su anterior credikiva compró 2 trasmayos de pesca y cajas de cervezas directamente al distribuidor, con lo cual vio su capital de trabajo aumentado y generó mas ingresos, que lo usualmente adquirido. En la actualidad se siente muy contenta y está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará cervezas en mayor volumen, preparándose para la temporada navideña y de fin de año, llena de festividades familiares, que lo ameritan y para que el sobrecosto no llegue a su negocio, teniendo inventarios suficientes para vender ella  y también para vender  los demás comerciantes de la zona, cuando no dispongan de la bebida . Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva " Deseo agradecer toda la ayuda recibida y espero que la vida les recompense todas las cosas buenas que hacen. "
texts.en:
With the previous credikiva, Rosa bought two fishing nets and beers directly from the distributor. This resulted in an increase of her working capital and income, compared to what she was used to. 

She feels happy now and is requesting a new credikiva, with which she will buy beers in larger quantities, in order to prepare for the holidays season. This season is full of celebrations, which justifies this decision and helps her avoid overhead costs by having enough stock. Not only will she be able to sell the beer to her customers, but also to other local shop-keepers when they run out of stock.

She wants to send a message to kiva lenders: "I would like to thank the help I have received and I hope that life gives you back all the good things you do."

loans.use: to buy beers in larger quantities.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maudy

texts.es:
Maudy, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es conviviente con Augusto quien es empleado y padre de sus 02 hijos de 3 y 2 años. Juntos  están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Maudy es la venta de comidas por las noches como juanes, pescados asados, tallarines y otros. Para eso instalará una mesa en el frontis de su casa donde atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos y transeúntes de la zona. 
Está retomando éste negocio pues lo había dejado por problemas personales, ahora consiguiendo los implementos necesarios como platos, ollas y otros. Y piensa realizarlo sola.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene ya que en su zona es muy conocida y solicitada, siendo sus vecinas quienes le piden que retome su negocio. 
Por otro lado, ella comenta que tiene problemas económicos pues con los ingresos de su pareja no les alcanza para cubrir todos sus gastos, por tanto quiere apoyarlo generándose un ingreso adicional.
Viendo lo rentable que es su negocio, y los pedidos que tiene, desea empezar y continuar hasta hacerlo crecer y en un futuro poder abrir un restaurante ya que le gusta la cocina. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar  sus planes. Por tanto se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal por el apoyo que vienen dando las personas con el acceso a créditos.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios para su negocio como ollas, vasos, platos, y otros, además de mesas y sillas, también ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus comidas buscando precios bajos por sus compras al contado y en volumen.
texts.en:
Maudy, 32, is a woman who very much wants to get ahead and provide a better quality of life for her family.  She lives with Augusto who is employed and the father of their two children who are 3 and 2 years old.  They are comfortably installed in their own house.  Maudy’s activity is selling food like ‘juanes,’[rice with meat and other ingredients wrapped in banana leaves] grilled fish, noodles and others in the evening.  To do so, she sets up a table in front of her house where she kindly takes care of all her customers who for the most part are neighbors and passersby in the area.  She had left the business for personal reasons and now plans to restart it and is gathering together the various items like dishes, pots and others, she needs.  She intends to carry it out alone.  She considers the business to be quite profitable because of the demand for it since she’s very well-known and sought-after in the zone; her neighbors have been asking her to go back into business.  
On the other hand, she comments that she has economic problems because her spouse’s income is insufficient to cover all her expenses which is why she wants to help out by earning additional income.

Seeing that her business is profitable and that she has pending orders, she wants to start and continue with it until it grows enough for her to open a restaurant because she likes to cook.  Therefore, this will be her second MFP loan.  She’s happy to know that she will be able to count on financial support to reach her goals.  She commits to being responsible with her installment payments like she was previously.  She also comments that she’s comfortable in her communal bank because of the support the people have given her in accessing loans.

She will use the requested 800 new soles to buy utensils for her business like pots, glasses, dishes and others as well as tables and chairs.  She will also buy ingredients needed to prepare the dishes looking for the lowest prices by buying in volume and paying cash.

loans.use: to buy pots, glasses, dishes and also tables and chairs.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly, de 64 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y decidida a salir adelante, su conviviente la abandono años atrás.  Vive en su propia casa en compañía de su hija y sus nietos, quienes la acompañas y la ayudan en los que haceres del hogar. La actividad que realiza Nelly es la costura y confección de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños, contando un pequeño taller que instaló en su casa, donde tiene 02 máquinas de coser semi-industrial que le sirven para realizar uno buenos acabados y realizar sus trabajos al gusto de sus clientes logrando ganarse sus preferencia. Tiene más de 30 años realizando ésta actividad, contando con la ayuda de una señora que conoce de costura y le paga por trabajo entregado.
 Comenta que  aprendió esta actividad estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, y hasta el momento le ha servido como una fuente de ingreso económico, y sentirse una persona productiva. También en sus ratos libres se dedica al estampado de telas las cuales vende a sus familiares y vecinos. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja. Por eso tiene planes de abrir una boutique en su propia casa, donde pueda exhibir sus productos. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 01 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete a  cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles los invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como telas, hilos elásticos y otros, buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Nelly, 64, is a hardworking woman who is determined to get ahead.  Her spouse abandoned her years ago.  She lives in her own house with her daughter and grandchildren who keep her company and help with household chores.  Nelly’s activity is sewing and designing clothes for women, men and children.  She has a small workshop at home where she has two semi-industrial sewing machines that are useful for making good finishing touches and to make the garments according to customers’ wishes thus winning over their loyalty.  She’s been doing this for more than 30 years with help from a lady who knows how to sew and she pays by the piece.

She comments that she learned this activity taking courses at an occupational education center and to date it’s been her source of income and a way for her to fees productive.  In her free time she prints fabric that she then sells to family members and neighbors.  She considers the business to be quite profitable because of the good profits it yields which is why she plans to open a boutique at home to display her products.  

This will be her first MFP loan and she’s very happy to know that she’ll have financial support because she’ll then feel sure to advance with her business.  On the other hand, she commits to make her payments.  Also, she’s happy to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.

She will use the requested 800 new soles to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread, elastic and others looking for the best prices available for volume purchases.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina, de 34 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y decidida con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Está casada con Jorge  quien es pintor de artes plásticas y padre de su hija Angi de 05 años de edad. Viven juntos en la comodidad de su propia casa que compraron con el fruto de sus ahorros de varios años. La actividad que realiza Carolina  es la  venta  de cuadros de artes platicas con detalles amazónicos de toda variedad, para eso cuenta con un espacio acondicionado en su propia casa, donde exhibe y atiende a sus clientes quienes la buscan por los buenos acabados, logrando ganarse el reconocimiento de sus clientes  y así la recomiendan con otras personas quienes compran los cuadros. Estos cuadros pintados son elaborados por su esposo quien aprendió estudiando y se perfeccionó con la práctica, además comparte su oficio con el servicio de transporte.
Este negocio lo realiza con la ayuda de un amigo que se encuentra en el extranjero para la venta de sus cuadros.
Se inicio hace más de 15 años en éste negocio, haciéndose conocida por la calidad y diseño de los cuadros, logrando reconocimiento para su esposo con esfuerzo.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la facilidad para realizarlo.
Decidió empezar con este negocio, por los deseos de dedicarse a su vocación y con la llegada de su hija, tiene muchas ganas de brindarle una mejor calidad de vida.
Por tanto y viendo los buenos resultados que está consiguiendo con su negocio,  desea continuar con su actividad. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 09 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Además esta contenta con su banco pues le gusta el apoyo de brindan a las personas con deseos de superación.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles, los invertirá para comprar materiales como pinturas acrílicas y oleos, tela de lona, marcos y demás, para que así su esposo puede seguir elaborando los cuadros que ella vende.
texts.en:
34-year-old Carolina is a hard-working, determined woman who has a great desire to get ahead in life.  She is married to Jorge.  Jorge is a painter who creates plastic art.  He is also the father of her 5-year-old daughter Angi.  The family live together in the comfort of their own home which they saved up a number of years to afford.  Carolina's business is selling all kinds of plastic art with Amazonian touches.  She has a suitable location in her own home where she exhibits the work and deals with her customers who are looking for well-finished pieces of work.  She thereby gains the recognition of her customers who then, in turn, recommend her to other people who also buy her artwork.  The artwork is created by her husband who learned by studying and then perfected his skills through practice.  In addition to this, he also works providing a transport service.

Carolina carries out her business with the help of a friend abroad who also sells the work.  The business was set up more than 15 years ago and they became well known for the quality and design of the artwork.  Her husband gained recognition through their hard work.

Carolina considers her business to be fairy profitable because it makes her good profits and the work is easy to carry out.  The couple decided to start the business as they wanted to dedicate themselves to their vocation.  Also, when their young daughter was born, they decided that they really wanted to provide her with a better quality of life.

Given the good results that she is obtaining in her business, Carolina would like to keep going with it.  This will be her ninth loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support as this will make her feel confident in her ability to make progress in the business.  Carolina is happy to belong to her community bank as she likes the support that is provided to people who are keen to better themselves.

Carolina will invest the 1,500 soles she has requested in buying materials such as acrylic paints, oil paints, canvases, frames, etc. so that her husband can continue producing the artwork that she sells.

loans.use: to buy acrylic paints, oil paints, canvases, frames, etc.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia es madre de dos hijos, ella trabaja desde su casa en el oficio de costura, confecciona prendas de vestir y las vende en el mercado local , con estos ingresos solventa los gastos de su hogar y sostiene a su familia. Su trabajo ha sido muy acogido por sus vecinas quienes adquieren sus productos, Sonia quiere abrir mercado en otras ciudades aledañas a la localidad donde vive, para ello solicita cuatrocientos mil colones 
¢400.000)con este préstamo comprará telas, accesorios, y una mejor máquina de coser, de esta manera aumentará su clientela y por ende sus ingresos .
texts.en: Sonia is the mother of two children. She works out of her home in the profession of dressmaking. She makes clothing and sells it at the local market. With this income, she covers the expenses of her household and supports her family. Her work has been very well-received by her neighbors, who buy her products. Sonia would like to enter into the market in other cities which are farther away from the place where she lives. For this, she is requesting four hundred thousand colones (¢400,000), and with this loan she will buy fabrics, accessories, and a better sewing machine. In this way she will increase her customer base and ultimately her income.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to make clothing, and to buy tailoring supplies.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan, está casado con la Sra. Myrian, él tiene un taller de rebobinados desde el año 1987. El es una persona muy trabajadora y lo demuestra, con todos estos años de trabajo que tiene.
El se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, y por medio de este trabajo ha podido dar a su familia todo lo que pueden. Juan quiere seguir trabajando y ganándose la vida honestamente, es por eso que solicita este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para su trabajo, como ser herramientas, con lo que podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Esta agradecido por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha utilidad, no solo a él, sino también a su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is married to Sra. Myrian. He has been operating a rewiring (electrical motor repair) shop since 1987. Juan is a hardworking person who has demonstrated this trait over many years. He has a good clientele that supply him with work so that he can provide everything his family needs.

Juan wants to continue working and earning a honest living, so he is requesting this loan in order to invest in the purchase of materials for his work, such as tools. This will enable him to offer better service to his customers.

Juan is grateful for the opportunity he has received. The loan will be very useful, not only to him, but also to his family.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies for his job of rewiring motors.

loans.name: Julia Aida

texts.es:
JULIA AIDA tiene 44 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene 5 hijos, vive con el conyugue y los hijos en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LA VICTORIA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JULIA AIDA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembras de maíz, insecticidas, urea. Las compras las realizara en la ciudad de Ventanas. Solicita el credito para comprar los fertilizantes, ranfer, urea, abonon orgánico. 

Con la ayuda del credito podrá estar un tiempo mejor hasta que comience las nuevas siembras.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan son las plagas cómo el cogollero, ratón. En el tiempo libre le gusta pasear con la familia.
texts.en:
Julia Aida, 44, is married and has 5 children.  She lives with her husband and children in the city of Ventanas in the Los Rios province.  

Julia Aida is a member of the communal bank "La Victoria."  This bank is located in Recinto Pantano, which is in Ventanas canton. The members of this group work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Julia Aida is a farmer who cultivates corn.  She purchases her supplies, including insecticides and urea, in the city of Ventanas.  She is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicide, urea, and organic fertilizers.  

With the help of this loan, she will be more prepared to plant her new crops.  She faces challenges in her work, including dealing with pests such as budworms and mice.  

In her free time, Julia Aida enjoys taking walks with her family.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers, herbicides, urea, and organic fertilizers

loans.name: Saqer

texts.en:
Saqer, who appears in the picture while at work, is a 27-year-old young man. He is married, and is the father of one son and two daughters.

For the past one and a half years, Saqer has had a barbershop, which has been a profitable project. However it needs more support and improvement so as to cover its costs and work in a better way.

Saqer is requesting a youth loan of 1,500 USD from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new barber kit and some necessary furniture items such as chairs and mirrors to provide a better quality of service to his loyal customers. This will improve Saqer's income positively and enable him to offer better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to purchase a new barber kit and furniture for his barber shop.

loans.name: Amílcar Efraín

texts.es:
El señor Amílcar tiene 56 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos, reside en una comunidad del Municipio de La Másica, Departamento de Atlántida.
Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de ropa y cosméticos, hace 5 años decidió establecer una pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios de la canasta básica.
En este momento ha solicitado un préstamo por la cantidad de 6,000 Lempiras los que piensa invertir en la compra de maíz, fríjoles, azúcar, arroz, carnes, lácteos, manteca, medicinas y productos de higiene.
Con el apoyo financiero lograra surtir su negocio, ofreciéndoles variedad de productos a sus clientes.
Su meta es reinvertir las  utilidades obtenidas para ver crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Amilcar, 56, is married and has 2 children.  He lives in a community in the municipality of La Masica, in the department of Atlantida.

Previously, Amilcar sold clothing and cosmetics, but 5 years ago he decided to set up a grocery store where he could sell staple consumer products.  

At this time, he has requested a loan of 6,000 Honduran lempiras, which he plans to use to buy corn, beans, sugar, rice, meat, dairy products, butter, medicines and hygiene products.  

With this financial support, he will be able to stock up his store and offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

Amilcar's goal is to reinvest the profits he obtains so that he can grow his business.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, sugar, rice, meat, dairy products, butter, medicines and hygiene products.

loans.name: Don Bosco Group

texts.es: Isabel es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Don Bosco” quien  participa desde  hace más de un año, la cual está conformado por 08 socios, ellos se caracterizan por ser personas responsables y emprendedores. Isabel de 30 años separada con 02 hijos menores de edad. Isabel se dedica a la venta de golosinas y refrigerios en un colegio. Comenzó este negocio vendiendo en las afueras del colegio, lo que pudo ahorrar con los trabajos realizados para alquilarse un puesto dentro del centro educativo, siendo sus mayores clientes alumnos y docentes de dicha institución. Se siente feliz pues gracias a su arduo trabajo a podido apoyar a sus niños. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de insumos como panes, gelatinas, golosinas, etc. Su mayor deseo es de comprarse su propia casa, ya que por el momento solo lo alquila.  Isabel se encuentra en la parte posterior, es la primera del lado izquierdo viste casaca color rosado. En la parte superior lado izquierdo esta Yene.
texts.en: Isabel is a member of the “Don Bosco” communal bank, where she has been participating for more than a year. The group is made up of 8 members, who are known for being responsible and enterprising people. Isabel is 30 years old and separated, with two minor children. Isabel works selling snacks and refrigerated items at a school. She started this business selling outside the school, and she saved up as much as she could from her work in order to rent a stand within the school complex, since her best customers were students and teachers from this institution. She feels happy, since thanks to her hard work, she has been able to support her children. She will use her most recent loan to buy supplies such as breads, gelatines, snacks, etc. Her greatest desire is to buy herself a house of her own, since at the moment she is only renting. Isabel is shown in the back row of the photo; she is the first on the left dressed in a pink jacket. In the upper area on the left is Yene.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as breads, gelatines and snacks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, dresses, pants (trousers), shirts, sweaters and underpants for his business

loans.name: Luis Miguel

texts.es:
LUIS MIGUEL tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LA VICTORIA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

LUIS MIGUEL se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Las compras las realizarla en la ciudad de Ventanas. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, líquido para la maleza, ranger.

Con la ayuda del crédito podra comprar los fertilizantes para la siembra y mejoraría los ingresos. Los deafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades, plagas en los cultivos.

En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Miguel is a single 22-year-old who does not have any children. He lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

He is a member of the La Victoria Communal Bank, which is located in the rural community of Pantano in the canton of Ventanas. The members earn their livings in the agricultural and fishing industries.

Luis Miguel is a farmer who plants corn and rice. He buys his materials in the city of Ventanas. He is applying for the loan to buy insecticides, urea, weed killer, and Ranger.

With the help of a loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for the sowing season and increase profits. The challenges that he faces are the sicknesses and plagues that affect crops. 

In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, urea, weed killer and Ranger.

loans.name: Jacintah

texts.en: Jacintah is a 32-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be a focused woman. She operates a grocery store where she sells vegetables, cereals and fruit. Her business is located in a viable business environment and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving her business. She will use her loan of 5800 KES to buy a solar lamp that will be used by her four family members at night. Her business goal is to improve her business within 5 years. She hopes to expand her business in the future. She has previously taken a loan of 20,000 KES which she managed to pay succesfully.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.
